official_title: A joint resolution to provide for the designation of the third week in February of 1982 as "National Patriotism Week" and to provide for the designation of the third Monday in February of 1982 as "National Holiday of Freedom".

summary.text: Requests the President to designate the third week in February of 1982 as "National Patriotism Week," and the third Monday in February of 1982 as "National Holiday of Freedom."

titles.title: A joint resolution to provide for the designation of the third week in February of 1982 as "National Patriotism Week" and to provide for the designation of the third Monday in February of 1982 as "National Holiday of Freedom".
